item.title: Writing Task II: Agree/disagree ü•µ
item.description: In IELTS writing task II, you are given a topic and your mission is to write an essay discussing it, and the total length of your answer should be at least 250 words. Example and step-by-step to complete this task Suppose you are dealing with the IELTS writing task II below. Task 2. Some people believe that governments should pay full course fees for students who want to study at universities.

item.title: IELTS: An overview
item.description: When I started to apply to a graduate program, I got stuck with the English certificate requirement. Currently, I am studying for IELTS and being prepared for the upcoming exam so I think one of the best ways to learn is by sharing. So in this sector, I write anything I learned. Of course, I hope it will be good material for you if you are the one also concerned about IELTS.

item.title: About
item.description: Educations 2018-2022 B.S. Honor program in Computer Science from Vietnam National University, Ho Chi Minh City - University of Information Technology(VNUHCM-UIT). Publications 2021 M. Tran, T. Pham, T. Nguyen, T. Do and T. N. Duc, “A robust framework for mathematical formula detection,” 2021 International Conference on Multimedia Analysis and Pattern Recognition (MAPR), 2021, pp. 1-6, doi: 10.1109/MAPR53640.2021.9585197. Vietnamese Patent 2022 Trien Thai, T. Nguyen, Tuan Nguyen. 2022. item.title: Project
item.description: 2022 Evaluate some deep learning methods for infographic visual question answering. (Bachelor’s thesis) code | report 2021 Estimate solutions of system of non-linear equations using Newton Raphson. code | report Instance search in image using DEep Local Features (DELF) code | report 2020 Detect failing bottle caps from stream camera video in industry. code | report Object detection implementation using Yolo and Capsule Network.
